00033 void OptionDialog::UpdateStatus()
00034 {
00035         if(m_fs==TRAIN_ADA && m_ratio==1)
00036         {
00037                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_AdaBoost))->SetCheck(BST_CHECKED);
00038                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_AsymBoost))->SetCheck(BST_UNCHECKED);
00039                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_FFS))->SetCheck(BST_UNCHECKED);
00040                 ((CEdit*)GetDlgItem(IDC_RATIO))->EnableWindow(FALSE);
00041         }
00042         else if(m_fs==TRAIN_ADA && m_ratio>1)
00043         {
00044                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_AdaBoost))->SetCheck(BST_UNCHECKED);
00045                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_AsymBoost))->SetCheck(BST_CHECKED);
00046                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_FFS))->SetCheck(BST_UNCHECKED);
00047                 ((CEdit*)GetDlgItem(IDC_RATIO))->EnableWindow(TRUE);
00048         }
00049         else if(m_fs==TRAIN_FFS)
00050         {
00051                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_AdaBoost))->SetCheck(BST_UNCHECKED);
00052                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_AsymBoost))->SetCheck(BST_UNCHECKED);
00053                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_FFS))->SetCheck(BST_CHECKED);
00054                 ((CEdit*)GetDlgItem(IDC_RATIO))->EnableWindow(FALSE);
00055         }
00056 
00057         if(m_lc==LC_ORIGINAL)
00058                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_Original))->SetCheck(BST_CHECKED);
00059         else if(m_lc==LC_LAC)
00060                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_LAC))->SetCheck(BST_CHECKED);
00061         else if(m_lc==LC_FDA)
00062                 ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_FDA))->SetCheck(BST_CHECKED);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void OptionDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00066 {
00067         CDialog::DoDataExchange(pDX);
00068         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_RATIO, m_ratio);
00069         DDV_MinMaxDouble(pDX, m_ratio, 1, 2);
00070         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_EDIT3, m_size);
00071         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_EDIT3, m_size);
00072         UpdateStatus();
00073 }

00088 void OptionDialog::OnBnClickedAdaboost()
00089 {
00090         m_fs = TRAIN_ADA;
00091         m_ratio = 1;
00092         ((CEdit*)GetDlgItem(IDC_RATIO))->SetWindowText("1");
00093         ((CEdit*)GetDlgItem(IDC_RATIO))->EnableWindow(FALSE);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void OptionDialog::OnBnClickedAsymboost()
00097 {
00098         m_fs = TRAIN_ADA;
00099         m_ratio = 1.0268;
00100         ((CEdit*)GetDlgItem(IDC_RATIO))->SetWindowText("1.0268");
